Charles Bunte

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Henry and Nellie Godtel
  3. Location of Family: Clay County, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Fairfield, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 13
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Fairfield News-Herald 23 June 1899; Fairfield News-Herald, 30 June 1899; Archives DB-Clients; 1900 United States Federal Census.
